snek_Sink Fangs.NAME: Sink Fangs
snek_Sink Fangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Necrotic Poison.

snek_Pandemonium.NAME: Pandemonium
snek_Pandemonium.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Confusion to a random character X times. NL Draw X Cards. NL Refund. NL Exhaust.
snek_Pandemonium.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Confusion to a random character X times. NL Draw X Cards. NL Refund.

snek_.NAME: Strike
snek_.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL Refund !M!

snek_Slither.NAME: Slither
snek_Slither.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL A random card in your hand costs !M! less this turn.

snek_Wild Rush.NAME: Wild Rush
snek_Wild Rush.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each confused character. NL Refund cost -1.

snek_.NAME: Strike
snek_.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play this turn costs twice as much, but triggers twice.

snek_Absence Of Mind.NAME: Absence of Mind
snek_Absence Of Mind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Confusion. NL Exhaust all Status cards in your hand or discard pile.
snek_Absence Of Mind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Confusion. NL Exhaust all Status and Curse cards in your hand or discard pile.

snek_.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain !M! Confusion. NL Refund. NL Exhaust.
Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Gain !M! Confusion. NL Refund. NL Exhaust.

snek_Hybernation.NAME: Hybernation
snek_Hybernation.DESCRIPTION: Conserve up to !M! energy between rounds.
